snippet: Militants struck a market in the town of Galkayo and then stormed a government building and engaged in gun battles with security forces....
abstract: Suicide bomb detonates in town of Galkayo, Somalia, killing at least 20 people and demonstrating ongoing threat posed by Shabab militants that, despite setbacks, continue to carry out deadly attacks around country.

byline.original: By JEFFREY GETTLEMAN and HUSSEIN MOHAMED
byline.contributor: Jeffrey Gettleman reported from Nairobi, and Hussein Mohamed from Mogadishu, Somalia.

lead_paragraph: Militants struck a market in the town of Galkayo and then stormed a government building and engaged in gun battles with security forces.

headline.main: Suicide Bombing Kills at Least 20 in Somalia
headline.print_headline: At Least 20 Die in Attack on Market in Somalia
